text: Ugo Colombo (22 February 1940 – 10 October 2019) was an Italian racing cyclist. He rode the Giro d'Italia in 1964–1974 with Filotex, with the best result of third place in 1971, and the Tour de France in 1966–1968, placing tenth in 1968. Colombo died on 10 October 2019 at the age of 79.Scomparso Ugo Colombo ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Ugo Colombo
